description:
The `k-collection` component is a wrapper around `k-items`
that adds sortabilty and pagination to the items.

props.name: columns
props.description: Optional column settings when using the table layout

props.name: empty
props.description: Empty state, see `k-empty` for all options

props.name: help
props.description: Help text to show below the collection

props.name: link
props.description: Enable/disable that each item is a clickable link

props.name: size
props.description: Size for items in cards layout

props.name: sortable
props.description: Whether the collection can be sorted

slots.name: options
slots.description: Replaces otions for each item from `options` key of item
